idea-plugin.name: Minecraft Mod Publish Utils
idea-plugin.description: Help developers publish mods faster and publish mods to multiple supported platforms with just a few clicks.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 0.0.5
    • [Feat] More uses for version parser: Automatically select version ranges
    • [Feat] Upload multiple files simultaneously
    • [Feat] Improved Toml parser
    • [Feat] When API errors occur, should return API ID
    • [Feat] Support using proxy server. Need to configure in settings.
    • [Feat] Support auto detecting current Git branch
    • [Optimize] Don't process Minecraft version list synchronously when creating UI
    • [Optimize] Cache isn't used effectively
    • [Change] Network request timeout increased from 15 to 20 seconds
    • [Translate] Added German translation
    • [Remove] Cancel plans to provide GitLab compatibility
    • [Chore] Use Lombok to clean code
    • [Chore] Add a prompt for CurseForge
    • [Chore] Bump minecraft version list
    • [Fix] Version parts should not be null
    • [Fix] The first value is not selected by default after refreshing Minecraft version list
    • [Fix] An incorrect judgment in the dependency manager
    • [Fix] When API returns error message, should not call getI18n method to create PublishResult
  • 0.0.4
    • [Feat] Improved Toml Parser
    • [Feat] Added variables for name template: low-version, max-version
    • [Feat] When publishing to Github, it will now automatically reuse existing release tags
    • [UI] Allow scrolling in the Publish page
    • [UI] Replaced Changelog input component with EditorTextField
    • [UI] PublishUI layout optimization
    • [Change] When publishing to Github/Gitlab, loader and support target selection is no longer mandatory
    • [Translate] Improved translations
    • [Translate] Added French translation
    • [Translate] Added Russian translation
    • [Translate] Added Spanish translation
    • [Chore] Bump minecraft version list
    • [Fix] Title repeatedly requests i18n
    • [Fix/Translate] Fixed incorrect Korean reference
  • 0.0.3
    • [Feat] Detect token decryption status on release page
    • [Feat] Improved hardware ID algorithm to prevent frequent token invalidation
    • [Feat] Added support for Github
    • [Feat] Github/GitLab branches are now optional, ModPublish will search for them in the repo
    • [Feat] Quick access to token application pages from settings
    • [Fix] Do not display tooltip for disabled release targets on release page
    • [Translate] Added Korean translation
    • [Translate] Added Traditional Chinese (HK) translation
    • [Translate] Improved translations
    • [Change] ModType name should be capitalized
  • 0.0.2
    • [Feat] Auto generate title based on mod name/version/loader or user-customized format
    • [Feat] Support for selecting release channels
    • [Optimize] Project configuration UI optimization
    • [Optimize] Project structure optimization
    • [Fix] Unable to read TOML
    • [Fix] Some other bugs (my commit records were lost, so I don't remember)
    • [Remove] No longer using JToml
  • 0.0.1 Release.
